actions.name: Hadron Engine

cost.trigger: At the start of combat, or when the user switches in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat, or when the user switches in.
Effect: The terrain is changed to Electric Terrain and remains Electric Terrain while the user is active on the field. Additionally, the user's SPATK increases by 33% while Electric Terrain is active. If the user uses Electro Drift while on Electric Terrain, their SPD stage increases by +1 for 5 activations. If the user Faints or is switched out, current active Electric Terrain lasts 5 rounds.
